homePage.instruction: Click on a country to view the news.

popup.difficulty: The only difficulty in creating this task was the lack of photos from the API so I have implemented a function to adds random photos where the original photo does not exist in order to 'UI that didn't look like a bough carved with a dull penknife'. :D
popup.fun: I literally had the most fun creating this whole app because I love programming and I get into flow every time I start coding. ;D
popup.ending: Seeing how many recruitment tasks you have to check, I thought I had put a meme for you to cheer yourself up. Have a nice day bro ;D
